column14: BEST As I wrote in a previous post if you cant handle the price fluctuations then sell and realize a permanent loss But if you can stomach the short term vol then try to average down your price and stick with this for another 12 24 months or whenever youre happy to take profit
Atlguy everything is going down and will likely go down for a bit longer I saw a 10 analyst target for TEN so will anchor against that
TEN when this goes sub 10 I will load up and average down Im at 1716 now
BEST volume is only 300K Thats is less than 13 of average Its prob going to bounced off 4 for a while and then slowly up to 5
